deletereportdefinition.name: DeleteReportDefinition
deletereportdefinition.description: Grants permission to delete Cost and Usage Report Definition

describereportdefinitions.name: DescribeReportDefinitions
describereportdefinitions.description: Grants permission to get Cost and Usage Report Definitions

getclassicreport.name: GetClassicReport
getclassicreport.description: Grants permission to get Bills CSV report

getclassicreportpreferences.name: GetClassicReportPreferences
getclassicreportpreferences.description: Grants permission to get the classic report enablement status for Usage Reports

getusagereport.name: GetUsageReport
getusagereport.description: Grants permission to get list of AWS services, usage type and operation for the Usage Report workflow. Allows or denies download of usage reports too

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

modifyreportdefinition.name: ModifyReportDefinition
modifyreportdefinition.description: Grants permission to modify Cost and Usage Report Definition

putclassicreportpreferences.name: PutClassicReportPreferences
putclassicreportpreferences.description: Grants permission to enable classic reports

putreportdefinition.name: PutReportDefinition
putreportdefinition.description: Grants permission to write Cost and Usage Report Definition

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

validatereportdestination.name: ValidateReportDestination
validatereportdestination.description: Grants permission to validates if the s3 bucket exists with appropriate permissions for CUR delivery
